ud4.2:4.2: The variant micchādiṭṭhigatena is the more obvious reading. However, micchādiṭṭhihatā appears at AN 4.49 without variants. Commentary accepts hata in both places. Here it glosses sassatādimicchābhinivesadūsitena.
ud4.2:5.1: Commentary: rakkhitacitto assa, literally “be one of guarded mind”.
